name: Heybly Cat Tree, 49.2 Inches Cat Tower for Indoor Cats, Spacious Cat House Condo with Hidden Space，Sturdy Steel Tube，Soft Plush Top Perch，Cozy Hammock and Sisal Scratching Posts, Smoky Gray HCT200SG
short_description: Ideal Design of Structure: Structure of the cat tree tower is designed according the climbing habits of cats. Two jumping platforms not only increase the active space but also help kitties and older cats to climb up and down

Sturdy Iron Pipe Design： Unlike other small cat trees, we have replaced two metal poles at the bottom, which are different in appearance from other cat trees, and also equipped with anti-tipping straps, which all add to the stability of the cat tree.

2 Top platforms：This plush cat tree features two top perches at 15.7'' × 9.8'' and 11.8'' x 11.8'' ,The edges and interior of the top platforms are designed with soft padding, so cats can enjoy the view or rest peacefully on the perches

Spacious Resting Areas：Our cat trees for indoor cats are designed with an enlarged cat house that can easily accommodate even chunky cats, as well as a cozy cat basket to provide your cat with the privacy and comfort they need for daily naps or playtime.

Easy to Assemble：Our cat furniture comes with illustrated instructions and the necessary toolkit, and can be easily assembled in just a couple minutes. If you have any questions about our cat towers, please feel free to contact us!

Sisal Rope Scratching Post: The cat tower with 9 scratching posts is meticulously lined with durable natural sisal ropes. The rough texture of sisal provides an ideal surface for your feline friends to scratch.

name: DUMOS 54-inch Indoor Cat Tree Tower –Multi-Level Pet House for Large Cats with 2 Condos, Scratching Posts, Round Platform, Small Ladder, and Toys – Perfect for Cats of All Ages, Dark Grey
short_description: 【Premium Construction】 Designed with your pet’s comfort in mind, this cat tree is built from high-quality, pet-safe materials. The soft plush fabric covering creates a cozy, warm space for your cats to relax. Durable natural sisal rope wraps the scratching posts, ensuring both safety and long-lasting use. Additionally, the base is reinforced with multiple layers of thick material to maintain stability and strength, providing a secure and enjoyable experience for your pets.

【Engaging Cat Playground】 Keep your cats entertained for hours with this interactive playground, featuring three sisal-wrapped scratching posts that support healthy claw maintenance. Hanging balls with bells offer an exciting playtime experience, mimicking the thrill of hunting. A thoughtfully placed ramp adds a fun climbing challenge, turning every play session into an adventurous activity your cats will love.

【Stable & Space-Saving Design】 Built for durability and efficient space use, this cat tree has a compact 50x50cm footprint, making it perfect for smaller rooms. Despite its size, it offers ample vertical space for up to 3-4 cats to enjoy simultaneously. For added safety, the included anti-tilt device allows you to secure the tower to the wall, ensuring stability and preventing tipping.

【Comfort & Fun in One】 This cat tree strikes the perfect balance between play and relaxation. With three climbable platforms, your cat can satisfy their curiosity and enjoy endless exploration. When it’s time to unwind, the two cozy cat condos provide a peaceful retreat for resting and napping.

【Simple Assembly】 The cat tree comes with a step-by-step assembly guide and all the necessary tools, including screws and a wrench. Each part is clearly labeled, making the setup process easy to follow. In about 40 minutes, you’ll have a complete, hassle-free setup ready for your cat to enjoy.

Directions Assembly: Unbox and lay out all pieces. Follow the step-by-step instructions included to assemble the cat tree. Placement: Position the cat tree against a wall or in a corner for added stability. Usage: Allow your cat to explore and play freely. Encourage use of scratching posts to help keep claws healthy. Maintenance: Regularly check for loose parts and clean with a vacuum or dry cloth.

Warranty Description This cat tree can accommodate up to 3-4 cats playing at the same time. We recommend that individual cats weigh 12 lbs or less for optimal stability. To ensure even better stability, please use the provided anti-tilt device to secure the cat tree to the wall, preventing any tipping in case of vigorous cat activities.
